base_description: Gray rectangular cabinet with a drop-down door.
part_description: Three open cubbies on top, one large drop-down door below. Rectangular shape, medium size, arranged vertically.
internal_interaction_description: The top cubbies provide open storage space, while the drop-down door conceals a larger compartment, allowing for organized storage. The door hinges facilitate smooth opening and closing, connecting the door securely to the cabinet structure.
external_interaction_description: The cabinet can be placed against a wall, used for storing items like books or decorative pieces. The drop-down door allows easy access to the main compartment, while the cubbies can hold smaller objects for quick retrieval. It interacts with the room by providing functional storage space.
